prompt: portrait 9:16, 8K, HD, high quality, very high detail. NO CARTOON, NO CGI. Mirror selfie of a woman with Y2K analog aesthetic, showcasing the feminine style typical of the early 2000s. Soft, dreamy, nostalgic visual with touches of old digital camera. Casual-girly, playful, effortless Y2K teen vibe (2000â€“2005). Pose: standing mirror selfie, one hand holding the camera partially covering the face. Body slightly turned, shoulders relaxed. Head slightly tilted. Facial expression soft, innocent, subtle smile or playful pout. Gaze toward mirror or camera screen. Outfit: pastel feminine baby tee / tank top (light pink, baby blue, cream). Mini A-line / low-rise Y2K skirt. Small Y2K shoulder bag (buckle or small logo). Beaded necklace / heart necklace. Small flower or butterfly earrings. Transparent or pastel plastic bracelets. Thin silver or pink chrome rings. Hair: long straight or slightly wavy, half-up, small twin ponytails, or left down with butterfly clips. Natural baby hairs in the front. Makeup: fair skin, soft feminine Y2K glam, light natural base, pink blush on cheeks and nose, pastel eyeshadow (pink/peach/champagne), thin clean eyeliner, natural curled eyelashes, soft natural eyebrows, glossy pink or clear lips. Background: bedroom or aesthetic bathroom Y2K style, mirror with slight smudges or simple frame. Lighting: room lamp + camera flash creating harsh highlight typical of analog mirror selfie. Camera: Digicam Y2K Canon IXUS, built-in lens, eye-level mirror selfie, half-body or full-body framing depending on mirror distance, slightly off-center composition for candid feel. Editing: Y2K analog digital cam style, soft pastel colors, low-medium contrast, slightly blown highlights, warm pinkish tones, analog grain noticeable, digital camera noise, slight blur & softness.
negative_prompt: cartoon, CGI, distorted face, incorrect outfit, wrong pose, unrealistic hair or makeup, modern fashion, overly sharp digital editing, harsh shadows, neutral or dull expression, low resolution
